trans-unit.source: Represents a field that is displayed as text in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Representerer et felt som vises som tekst i en databundet-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The BoundField class is used by data-bound controls (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>) to display the value of a field as text.
trans-unit.target: Klassen BoundField brukes av databundet kontroller (eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>) til å vise verdien til et felt som tekst.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The BoundField object is displayed differently depending on the data-bound control in which it is used.
trans-unit.target: Objektet BoundField vises forskjellig avhengig databundet kontrollen den brukes.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control displays a BoundField object as a column, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control displays it as a row.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen viser en BoundField-objektet som en kolonne, mens den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen viser som en rad.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To specify the field to display in a BoundField object, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataField%2A> property to the field's name.
trans-unit.target: Angi felt skal vises i et BoundField-objekt, kan du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataField%2A>egenskapen feltnavnet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The field's value can be HTML-encoded before it is displayed by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HtmlEncode%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Feltverdien kan være HTML-kodet før den vises ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HtmlEncode%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HtmlEncode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can apply a custom formatting string to the field's value by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke en egendefinert formatering streng feltverdien ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HtmlEncode%2A> property is `true`, the encoded string value of the field is used in the custom format string.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HtmlEncode%2A>egenskapen `true`, kodet strengverdien i feltet brukes i den egendefinerte Formatstrengen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HtmlEncode%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the formatting string is applied to field values only when the data-bound control is in read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: Som standard brukes formatering strengen feltverdier bare når kontrollen databundet er i skrivebeskyttet modus.

trans-unit.source: To apply the formatting string to values displayed while the data-bound control is in edit mode, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ApplyFormatInEditMode%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: For å bruke formatering strengen verdiene som vises under databundet kontrollen i redigeringsmodus, kan du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ApplyFormatInEditMode%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ApplyFormatInEditMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a field's value is null, you can display a custom caption by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for et felt er null, kan du vise en egendefinert tekst ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The BoundField object can also automatically convert empty string ("") field values to null values by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: BoundField-objektet kan også automatisk konvertere tom streng ("") feltet verdier null-verdier ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can hide a BoundField object in a data-bound control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Du kan skjule et BoundField objekt i en databundet-kontroll ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: To prevent the value of a field from being modified in edit mode, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ReadOnly%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: For å hindre at verdien for et felt som endres i redigeringsmodus, kan du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ReadOnly%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: In data-bound controls that support inserting records (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control), you can hide a BoundField object by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.InsertVisible%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer som støtter poster i databindingselementer (som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen), kan du skjule et BoundField objekt ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.InsertVisible%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.InsertVisible%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This is commonly done when you want to hide an automatically generated key field in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: Dette skjer vanligvis når du vil skjule en automatisk generert nøkkelfelt i insert-modus.

trans-unit.source: You can customize the header and footer sections of a BoundField object.
trans-unit.target: Du kan tilpasse topp- og bunntekst delene av et BoundField-objekt.

trans-unit.source: To display a caption in the header or footer sections, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: For å vise en tekst i toppteksten eller bunnteksten deler, kan du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A>Egenskaper henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead of displaying text in the header section, you can display an image by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan vise et bilde i stedet for å vise tekst i toppteksten, ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The header section can be hidden in the BoundField object by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Toppteksten kan skjules i BoundField-objektet ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Some data-bound controls (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control) can show or hide only the entire header section of the control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Noen databundet kontroller (slik som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen) kan vise eller skjule bare delen hele topp kontrollens.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: These data-bound controls do not support the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A> property for an individual bound field.
trans-unit.target: Disse databundet kontroller støtter ikke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A>egenskapen for et enkelt bundne.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A>

trans-unit.source: To show or hide the entire header section of a data-bound control (if available), use the control's `ShowHeader` property.
trans-unit.target: Vis eller Skjul delen hele overskrift for en databundet kontroll (hvis tilgjengelig), bruker kontrollens `ShowHeader` egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: You also can customize the appearance of the BoundField object (font color, background color, and so on) by setting the style properties for the different parts of the field.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også tilpasse utseendet til BoundField objektet (skriftfarge bakgrunnsfarge og så videre) ved å angi stilegenskaper for de ulike delene av feltet.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different style properties.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser egenskapene annen stil.

trans-unit.source: |Style property|Description| |--------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ControlStyle%2A>|The style settings for the child Web server controls of the BoundField object.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterStyle%2A>|The style settings for the footer section of the BoundField object.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderStyle%2A>|The style settings for the header section of the BoundField object.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ItemStyle%2A>|The style settings for the data items in the BoundField object.|
trans-unit.target: | Style-egenskapen | Beskrivelse | |--------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ControlStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for de underordnede server webkontroller for BoundField-objektet. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for bunnteksten for BoundField-objektet. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for delen topptekst for BoundField-objektet. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ItemStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for dataelementer i BoundField-objektet. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ControlStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å initialisere en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren brukes vanligvis når du legger til felt til en dynamisk opprettet databundet-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: To dynamically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object to a data-bound control, create a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object, set its properties, and then add it to the data-bound control's field collection.
trans-unit.target: Dynamisk legge til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>objekt til en databundet kontroll, Opprett en ny <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>objekt, angi egenskapene og deretter legge den til databindingselementer kontrollens feltet samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, add the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du bruker for eksempel den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>styre, legge til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>objekt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although you can dynamically add fields to a data-bound control, it is strongly recommended that fields be statically declared and then shown or hidden, as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Selv om dynamisk kan du legge til felt i en databundet, det anbefales at feltene statisk deklarert og deretter vises eller skjules, etter behov.

trans-unit.source: Statically declaring all of your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Statisk deklarerer alle feltene reduserer størrelsen på visningsstatusen for den overordnede databundet kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the formatting string specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString*> property is applied to field values when the data-bound control that contains the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref> object is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om formatering strengen angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString*>egenskapen skal brukes på feltverdier når kontrollen databundet som inneholder den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"> </xref> objektet er i redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString*>

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>) have different display modes that allow the user to read, edit, or insert records.
trans-unit.target: Databundet kontroller (eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>) har ulike visningsmodus som tillater brukeren å lese, redigere eller sette inn poster.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: By default, the formatting string specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A> property is applied to field values only when the data-bound control is in read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: Som standard formatering strengen som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A>egenskapen skal brukes på feltverdier bare når kontrollen databundet er i skrivebeskyttet modus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A>

trans-unit.source: To apply the formatting string to values displayed while the data-bound control is in edit mode, set the ApplyFormatInEditMode property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: For å bruke formatering strengen verdiene som vises under databundet kontrollen i redigeringsmodus, angi ApplyFormatInEditMode egenskapen `true`.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object does not automatically remove the formatting when the field is updated in the data source.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>objektet automatisk fjernes ikke formateringen når oppdateres feltet i datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: If you do not want the formatting as part of the value stored, you will need to remove the formatting programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil formatere som en del av verdien som er lagret, må du fjerne formateringen programmatisk.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to apply the formatting string to field values in edit mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å formatere streng feltverdiene i redigeringsmodus; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether empty string values ("") are automatically converted to null values when the data field is updated in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om tomme strengverdier ("") automatisk konverteres til null-verdier når oppdateres data-feltet i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Sometimes the user might enter an empty string for a field value when updating or inserting records.
trans-unit.target: Noen ganger kan brukeren angi en tom streng for verdi for feltet når du oppdaterer eller setter inn poster.

trans-unit.source: Use the ConvertEmptyStringToNull property to specify whether an empty string value is automatically converted to null when the data field is updated in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ConvertEmptyStringToNull-egenskapen til å angi om en tom strengverdi konverteres automatisk til null når oppdateres data-feltet i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > By default, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object displays null values as empty strings.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Som standard en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>objektet viser nullverdier som tomme strenger.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: To display a different value, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å vise en annen verdi, kan du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to automatically convert empty string values to null values; otherwise, the <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>automatisk konvertere tomme strengverdier til null-verdier. Hvis ikke, den <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the properties of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref> object to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Overfører egenskaper for gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"> </xref> objektet til den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The CopyProperties method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to copy the properties of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> object created by the method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CopyProperties er helper metode som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å kopiere egenskaper for gjeldende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>objekt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>objektet er opprettet av metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> to copy the properties of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref> to.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> å kopiere egenskaper for gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"> </xref> til.

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter et tomt <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The CreateField method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to create an empty <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object to copy the properties of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object to.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateField er helper metode som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å opprette en tom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>objektet du vil kopiere egenskaper for gjeldende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>objekt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the data field to bind to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på datafeltet skal bindes til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataField property to specify the name of the data field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk DataField-egenskapen til å angi navnet på datafeltet skal bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: The values of the specified field are displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object as text.
trans-unit.target: Verdiene i det angitte feltet skal vises i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>objektet som tekst.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: You can optionally format the displayed text by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan eventuelt formatere teksten som vises ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If a field's value is null, an empty string ("") is displayed for the value by default.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis verdien for et felt er null, en tom streng ("") vises for verdien som standard.

trans-unit.source: To specify an alternate caption, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi en alternativ teksten, kan du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the data field to bind to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på feltet dataene skal bindes til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for the value of the field.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir strengen som angir visningsformatet for verdien i feltet.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataFormatString property to specify a custom display format for the values that are displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk DataFormatString-egenskapen til å angi et egendefinert visningsformat for verdiene som vises i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: If the DataFormatString property is not set, the field's value is displayed without any special formatting.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen DataFormatString ikke er angitt, vises feltverdien uten formatering.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In versions of ASP.NET earlier than 3.5, you must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HtmlEncode%2A> property to `false` in order to format fields that are not string data types.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I ASP.NET-versjoner som er eldre enn 3.5, må du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HtmlEncode%2A>egenskapen `false` for å formatere streng felt som ikke datatyper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HtmlEncode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the field value is converted to a string by the default conversion method before the format string that is stored in the DataFormatString property is applied.
trans-unit.target: Ellers konverteres feltverdien til en streng med standard konverteringsmetoden før Formatstrengen som er lagret i egenskapen DataFormatString brukes.

trans-unit.source: By default, the formatting string is applied to the field value only when the data-bound control that contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object is in read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: Som standard formatering strengen brukes på feltverdien bare når kontrollen databundet som inneholder den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>objektet er i skrivebeskyttet modus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: To apply the formatting string to field values while in edit mode, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ApplyFormatInEditMode%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: For å bruke formatering strengen feltverdiene i redigeringsmodus, kan du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ApplyFormatInEditMode%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ApplyFormatInEditMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The formatting string can be any literal string and usually includes a placeholder for the field's value.
trans-unit.target: Formatering strengen kan være en strenglitteral og inkluderer vanligvis en plassholder for feltverdien.

trans-unit.source: For example, in the formatting string `Item Value: {0}`, the field's value is substituted for the {0} placeholder when the string is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel i formatering strengen `Item Value: {0}`, feltverdien blir erstattet for plassholderen {0} når strengen vises i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: The rest of the formatting string is displayed as literal text.
trans-unit.target: Resten av formatering strengen vises som litteral tekst.

trans-unit.source: If the formatting string does not include a placeholder, only the formatting string itself is included in the final display text (the field's value from the data source is not included).
trans-unit.target: Hvis formatering strengen ikke inneholder en plassholder, inkludert bare formatering strengen seg selv i endelig teksten (feltverdien fra datakilden ikke er inkludert).

trans-unit.source: If the placeholder is a 0 (zero) enclosed in curly braces as shown in the preceding example, the field value is converted to a string by the default method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis plassholderen er 0 (null) omsluttet klammeparenteser som vist i det forrige eksemplet, konverteres feltverdien til en streng med standardmetoden.

trans-unit.source: You can append to the zero a string that specifies how the field value should be formatted.
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til nullen en streng som angir hvordan feltverdien skal formateres.

trans-unit.source: For example, the placeholder `{0:C}` for a numeric field specifies that value of the field should be converted to a currency format.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel plassholderen `{0:C}` for et numerisk felt angir at verdien i feltet skal konverteres til et valutaformat.

trans-unit.source: Formatting is applied by using the <xref:System.String.Format%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Formateringen ved hjelp av den <xref:System.String.Format%2A>metoden.</xref:System.String.Format%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number that follows the left curly brace is part of the syntax used by that method and indicates which one of a series of values the placeholder should use.
trans-unit.target: Tallet som følger det venstre klammeparentes er en del av syntaksen som brukes med denne metoden, og angir som en av en serie med verdier plassholderen skal bruke.

trans-unit.source: Because there is only one field value in each cell, the number that follows the left curly brace can only be set to 0.
trans-unit.target: Fordi det er bare én verdi for feltet i hver celle, kan bare tall som følger det venstre klammeparentes angis til 0.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the standard format characters for numeric fields.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser standard format tegnene for numeriske felt.

trans-unit.source: These format characters are not case-sensitive, except for `X`, which displays hexadecimal characters in the case that is specified.
trans-unit.target: Disse format-tegn er bokstaver, bortsett fra for `X`, som viser heksadesimale tegn i tilfelle som er angitt.

trans-unit.source: You can append a number to most format characters in order to specify how many significant digits or decimal places you want to display.
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til et tall til lengst format for å angi hvor mange signifikante sifre eller desimaler du vil vise.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In most cases, formatting depends on the server's culture setting.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I de fleste tilfeller formatering avhenger av serverens kultur.

trans-unit.source: The examples are for a culture setting of `en-US`.
trans-unit.target: Eksemplene er for kulturen innstillingen `en-US`.

trans-unit.source: |Format character|Description|Example| |----------------------|-----------------|-------------| |`C` or `c`|Displays numeric values in currency format.
trans-unit.target: | Formater tegnet | Beskrivelse | Eksempel | |----------------------|-----------------|-------------| | `C` or `c`| Viser numeriske verdier i valutaformat.

trans-unit.source: You can specify the number of decimal places.|Format: `{0:C}`
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi antallet desimaler. | Format:`{0:C}`

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:C3}`
trans-unit.target: Format:`{0:C3}`

trans-unit.source: 123.456 -> $123.456| |`D` or `d`|Displays integer values in decimal format.
trans-unit.target: 123.456-> $123.456 | | `D` or `d`| Viser heltallsverdier i desimalformat.

trans-unit.source: You can specify the number of digits.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi antallet sifre.

trans-unit.source: (Although the type is referred to as "decimal", the numbers are formatted as integers.)|Format: `{0:D}`
trans-unit.target: (Selv om typen kalles "decimal", tallene er formatert som heltall.) | Format:`{0:D}`

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:D6}`
trans-unit.target: Format:`{0:D6}`

trans-unit.source: 1234 -> 001234| |`E` or `e`|Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.
trans-unit.target: 1234-> 001234 | | `E` or `e`| Viser numeriske verdier i eksponentielt format (eksponentiell).

trans-unit.source: You can specify the number of decimal places.|Format: `{0:E}`
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi antallet desimaler. | Format:`{0:E}`

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:E2}`
trans-unit.target: Format:`{0:E2}`

trans-unit.source: -1052.0329112756 -> -1.05e+003| |`F` or `f`|Displays numeric values in fixed format.
trans-unit.target: -1052.0329112756-> -&1;.05e +&003; | | `F` or `f`| Viser numeriske verdier med fast format.

trans-unit.source: You can specify the number of decimal places.|Format: `{0:F}`
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi antallet desimaler. | Format:`{0:F}`

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:F3}`
trans-unit.target: Format:`{0:F3}`

trans-unit.source: 1234.567 -> 1234.567| |`G` or `g`|Displays numeric values in general format (the most compact of either fixed-point or scientific notation).
trans-unit.target: 1234.567-> 1234.567 | | `G` or `g`| Viser numeriske verdier i formatet (mest CD-ROM faste punkt eller vitenskapelig notasjon).

trans-unit.source: You can specify the number of significant digits.|Format: `{0:G}`
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi antall signifikante sifre. | Format:`{0:G}`

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:G2}`
trans-unit.target: Format:`{0:G2}`

trans-unit.source: -123.456 -> -120| |`N` or `n`|Displays numeric values in number format (including group separators and optional negative sign).
trans-unit.target: -123.456->-120 | | `N` or `n`| Viser numeriske verdier i tallformat (inkludert Gruppeskilletegn og valgfri minustegn).

trans-unit.source: You can specify the number of decimal places.|Format: `{0:N}`
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi antallet desimaler. | Format:`{0:N}`

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:N4}`
trans-unit.target: Format:`{0:N4}`

trans-unit.source: 1234.567 -> 1,234.5670| |`P` or `p`|Displays numeric values in percent format.
trans-unit.target: 1234.567-> 1,234.5670 | | `P` or `p`| Viser numeriske verdier i prosent format.

trans-unit.source: You can specify the number of decimal places.|Format: `{0:P}`
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi antallet desimaler. | Format:`{0:P}`

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:P1}`
trans-unit.target: Format:`{0:P1}`

trans-unit.source: .5 -> 50.0%| |`R` or `r`|Displays <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, or `BigInteger` values in round-trip format.|Format: `{0:R}`
trans-unit.target: .5-> 50,0% | | `R` or `r`| Viser <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, eller `BigInteger` verdier i gå i retur-format. | Format: `{0:R}`</xref:System.Double></xref:System.Single>

trans-unit.source: 123456789.12345678 -> 123456789.12345678| |`X` or `x`|Displays integer values in hexadecimal format.
trans-unit.target: 123456789.12345678-> 123456789.12345678 | | `X` or `x`| Viser heltallsverdier i heksadesimalt format.

trans-unit.source: You can specify the number of digits.|Format: `{0:X}`
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi antallet sifre. | Format:`{0:X}`

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:x4}`
trans-unit.target: Format:`{0:x4}`

trans-unit.source: 255 -> 00ff| For more information and for examples that show formatting for other culture values, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 255-> 00ff | Du finner mer informasjon og eksempler som viser formatering for andre kultur verdier, se [Standard numerisk formatstrenger](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: You can also create custom numeric format strings.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også opprette egendefinerte tallformatstrenger.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [egendefinert numerisk formatstrenger](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The following table lists format characters for <xref:System.DateTime> fields.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser format tegn for <xref:System.DateTime>felt.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Most of these formatting specifications result in a different output depending on culture settings.
trans-unit.target: De fleste av disse formatering spesifikasjonene føre til en annen utdata avhengig av kulturen innstillinger.

trans-unit.source: The examples are for a <xref:System.DateTime> value of 6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM with a culture setting of `en-US`.
trans-unit.target: Eksemplene er en <xref:System.DateTime>6/15/2009 verdien 1:45:30 PM med kulturen innstillingen `en-US`.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: |Format character|Description|Example| |----------------------|-----------------|-------------| |`d`|Short date pattern.|Format: `{0:d}`
trans-unit.target: | Formater tegnet | Beskrivelse | Eksempel | |----------------------|-----------------|-------------| | `d`| Korte datoformatet mønsteret. | Format:`{0:d}`
6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM-> 6/15/2009 | | `D`| Mønstret for lang dato. | Format:`{0:D}`

trans-unit.source: 6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM ->Monday, June 15, 2009| |`f`|Full date/time pattern (short time).|Format: `{0:f}`
trans-unit.target: 6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM-> mandag 15. juni 2009 | | `f`| Fullstendig dato/klokkeslett mønsteret (kort tid). | Format:`{0:f}`

trans-unit.source: 6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> Monday, June 15, 2009 1:45 PM| |`F`|Full date/time pattern (long time).|Format: `{0:F}`
trans-unit.target: 6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM-> mandag juni 15, 2009 1:45 PM | | `F`| Fullstendig dato/klokkeslett mønsteret (lang tid). | Format:`{0:F}`

trans-unit.source: 6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> Monday, June 15, 2009 1:45:30 PM| |`g`|General date/time pattern (short time).|Format: `{0:g}`
trans-unit.target: 6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM-> mandag juni 15, 2009 1:45:30 PM | | `g`| Generell dato/klokkeslett mønsteret (kort tid). | Format:`{0:g}`

trans-unit.source: 6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> 6/15/2009 1:45 PM| |`G`|General date/time pattern (long time).|Format: `{0:G}`
trans-unit.target: 6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM-> 6/15/2009 1:45 PM | | `G`| Generell dato/klokkeslett mønsteret (lang tid). | Format:`{0:G}`

trans-unit.source: 6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> June 15| |`O` or `o`|Round-trip date/time pattern.|Format: `{0:o}`
trans-unit.target: 6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM-> juni 15 | | `O` or `o`| Rundtur dato/klokkeslett mønsteret. | Format:`{0:o}`

trans-unit.source: 6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> 2009-06-15T13:45:30.0900000| |`R` or `r`|RFC1123 pattern (for information, see <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.RFC1123Pattern%2A?displayProperty=fullName>).|Format: `{0:R}`
trans-unit.target: 6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM-> 2009 – 06-15T13:45:30.0900000 | | `R` or `r`| RFC1123 mønsteret (se <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.RFC1123Pattern%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for informasjon). | Format: `{0:R}` </xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.RFC1123Pattern%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: 6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> Mon, 15 Jun 2009 20:45:30 GMT| |`s`|Sortable date/time pattern.|Format: `{0:s}`
trans-unit.target: 6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM-> man 15 juni 2009 20:45:30 GMT | | `s`| Sorterbar dato/klokkeslett mønsteret. | Format:`{0:s}`

trans-unit.source: 6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> 1:45 PM| |`T`|Long time pattern.|Format: `{0:T}`
trans-unit.target: 6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM-> 1:45 PM | | `T`| Lang Tidsmønsteret. | Format:`{0:T}`

trans-unit.source: 6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> 1:45:30 PM| |`u`|Universal sortable date/time pattern.|Format: `{0:u}`
trans-unit.target: 6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM-> 1:45:30 PM | | `u`| Mønstret for Universal sorterbar dato/klokkeslett. | Format:`{0:u}`

trans-unit.source: 6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> 2009-06-15 20:45:30Z| |`U`|Universal full date/time pattern.|Format: `{0:U}`
trans-unit.target: 6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM-> 2009-06-15 20:45:30Z | | `U`| Mønstret for Universal fullstendig dato/klokkeslett. | Format:`{0:U}`

trans-unit.source: 6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> Monday, June 15, 2009 8:45:30 PM| |`Y` or `y`|Year month pattern.|Format: `{0:Y}`
trans-unit.target: 6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM-> mandag juni 15, 2009 8:45:30 PM | | `Y` or `y`| Året måned mønsteret. | Format:`{0:Y}`

trans-unit.source: 6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> June, 2009| For more information and for examples that show formatting for other culture values, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM-> juni 2009 | Du finner mer informasjon og eksempler som viser formatering for andre kultur verdier, se [Standard dato og klokkeslett-formatstrenger](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: You can also create custom date and time format strings.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også opprette egendefinerte dato og klokkeslett-formatstrenger.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [egendefinert dato og klokkeslett-formatstrenger](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A formatting string that specifies the display format for the value of the field.
trans-unit.target: En formatering tekststreng som angir visningsformatet for verdien i feltet.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that no special formatting is applied to the field value.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at ingen spesielle formateringen til feltverdien.

trans-unit.source: Fills the specified <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> object with the values from the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Fyller den angitte <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> objektet med verdiene fra den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The ExtractValuesFromCell method is provided as a convenient way to retrieve the values of the fields from the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ExtractValuesFromCell er angitt som en enkel måte å hente verdier for feltene fra den angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>objekt i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: This method does not have a return value.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden har ikke en returverdi.

trans-unit.source: Instead, the field values are returned by reference through the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> object passed in for the `dictionary` parameter.
trans-unit.target: I stedet feltverdiene returneres av referansen via den <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>objekt sendt for den `dictionary` parameteren.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: After the method has been called, iterate through the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> object to access the field values.
trans-unit.target: Etter at den har blitt kalt, gå gjennom den <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>objekt for å få tilgang til feltverdiene.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object contains read-only field values, you must pass in `true` for the `includeReadOnly` parameter to include those values.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>objektet inneholder skrivebeskyttede feltverdier, må du sende i `true` for den `includeReadOnly` parameteren inkludere verdiene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> used to store the values of the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> brukes til å lagre verdiene i den angitte cellen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref> that contains the values to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"> </xref> som inneholder verdiene du vil hente.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include the values of read-only fields; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å ta med verdier skrivebeskyttet feltene. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Formats the specified field value for a cell in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Formaterer den angitte feltverdien for en celle i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The FormatDataValue method is a helper method used to transform a field value to the format specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Metoden FormatDataValue er helper metode som brukes til å gjøre en verdi for feltet til formatet som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a field value is null, the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A> property is returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en verdi for feltet er null, verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A>egenskapen returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: The field value to format.
trans-unit.target: Feltverdien til å formatere.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to encode the value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>kode verdien. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The field value converted to the format specified by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString*>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien i feltet konverteres til formatet som er angitt av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString*>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the value used for a field's value when rendering the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref> object in a designer.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdien brukt for en feltverdien ved gjengivelse av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"> </xref> objekt i en designer.

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeValue method is a helper method used to determine what value to display for a field when rendering the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object in a designer.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetDesignTimeValue er en helper brukes til å bestemme hva verdien skal vises for et felt ved gjengivelse av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>objekt i en designer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: If real data cannot be retrieved from the data source at design time, the value returned by this method is displayed instead.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke kan hente reelle data fra datakilden på utformingstidspunktet, vises verdien som returneres av denne metoden i stedet.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: The value to display in the designer as the field's value.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som skal vises i designer som feltverdien.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the value of the field bound to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdien av feltet som er bundet til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The GetValue method is a helper method used to determine the value of a field.
trans-unit.target: GetValue-metoden er en helper brukes til å bestemme verdien for et felt.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object is being displayed in a designer and the field value cannot be determined at design time, the value returned from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.GetDesignTimeValue%2A> method is returned instead of the actual field value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>objektet vises i en designer og feltverdien kan ikke fastslås på utformingstidspunktet, returneres verdien fra det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.GetDesignTimeValue%2A>metoden returnert i stedet for den faktiske feltverdien.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.GetDesignTimeValue%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: The container for the field value.
trans-unit.target: Beholder for feltverdien.

trans-unit.source: The value of the field bound to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien i feltet som er bundet til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that is displayed in the header of a data control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som vises i hodet til en kontroll av data.

trans-unit.source: Use the HeaderText property to identify a field in a data control with a friendly name.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen HeaderText identifiserer et felt i et data-kontroll med et egendefinert navn.

trans-unit.source: The most common application of the HeaderText property is to provide meaningful column names to data-bound fields in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Vanligste programmet for egenskapen HeaderText er å angi betydning kolonnenavn til databindingselementer feltene i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The text displayed in the header of a data control.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som vises i hodet til en kontroll av data.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether field values are HTML-encoded before they are displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om feltverdier er HTML-kodet før de vises i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if field values are HTML-encoded before they are displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref> object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis verdiene er HTML-kodet før de vises i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"> </xref> objekt; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether text that is created by applying the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString*> property to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref> value should be HTML encoded when it is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om teksten som er opprettet ved å bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString*>egenskapen til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"> </xref> verdien må være HTML-kodede når den vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the text should be HTML-encoded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis det skal stå HTML-kodet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The Initialize method is called by the data control with which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object is associated to perform basic object initialization for instances of the field, before the field is ever added to a rows collection.
trans-unit.target: I initialiseringsmetoden kalles av datakontrollen som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>objektet som er knyttet til å utføre grunnleggende objektet initialisering for forekomster av feltet før feltet noensinne lagt til i en samling med rader.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: Data controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Initialize%2A> method in their `CreateChildControls` methods before other methods such as `CreateRow` are called to create specific rows with data.
trans-unit.target: Data kontroller for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kalle den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Initialize%2A>metoden i sine `CreateChildControls` metodene før andre metoder som `CreateRow` kalles for å opprette bestemte rader med data.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Initialize%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Call this method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects to perform basic initialization for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object.
trans-unit.target: Kall denne metoden når du skriver et egendefinert databundet kontrollere som bruker <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>objekter til å utføre grunnleggende initialisering for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>

trans-unit.source: Implement this method if your <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>-derived type requires any object initialization before it populates <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects with data or controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.InitializeCell%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Implementer denne metoden hvis din <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>-avledet type krever en objekt-initialisering før den fyller ut <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>objekter med data, eller kontroller i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.InitializeCell%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.InitializeCell%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if sorting is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis sortering støttes. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The data control that owns the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Datakontrollen som eier den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>i alle tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref> object to the specified row state.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer angitt <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"> </xref> objektet til den angitte rad-tilstanden.

trans-unit.source: The InitializeCell method is implemented by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>-derived types to add text and controls to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object of a data control that uses tables to display a user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: Metoden InitializeCell implementeres av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>-avledede typer for å legge til tekst og kontroller til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>objekt til en kontroll med data som bruker tabeller til å vise brukergrensesnittet (UI).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: These data controls create the complete table structure row-by-row when the control's `CreateChildControls` method is called.
trans-unit.target: Disse Kontroller opprette hele tabellen strukturen rad-av-raden når kontrollens `CreateChildControls` -metoden.

trans-unit.source: The InitializeCell method is called by the `InitializeRow` method of data controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden InitializeCell kalles av den `InitializeRow` -metoden til kontroller for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Call this method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects to initialize the cells of the table structure with data or controls.
trans-unit.target: Kall denne metoden når du skriver et egendefinert databundet kontrollere som bruker <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>objekter initialisere cellene i tabellstrukturen med data eller kontroller.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>

trans-unit.source: Implement this method when you are writing a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>-derived class.
trans-unit.target: Implementer denne metoden når du skriver et <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>-avledet klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref> to initialize.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"> </xref> ikke initialisert.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCellType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCellType"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the row.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for raden.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref> object to the specified row state.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer angitt <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"> </xref> objektet til den angitte rad-tilstanden.

trans-unit.source: The InitializeDataCell method is a helper method used to initialize a cell in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden InitializeDataCell er en helper brukes til å initialisere en celle i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref> to initialize.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"> </xref> ikke initialisert.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Restores the previously stored view-state information for this field.
trans-unit.target: Gjenoppretter tidligere lagret visningsstatus informasjon for dette feltet.

trans-unit.source: Represents the control state to be restored.
trans-unit.target: Representerer tilstanden kontrollen skal gjenopprettes.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the caption displayed for a field when the field's value is null.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som vises for et felt når feltverdien er null.

trans-unit.source: Sometimes a field's value is stored as null in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Noen ganger lagres verdien for et felt som null i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: You can specify a custom caption to display for fields that have a null value by setting the NullDisplayText property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi en egendefinert tekst som vises for felt som har en nullverdi ved å angi egenskapen NullDisplayText.

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set, null field values are displayed as empty strings ("").
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen ikke er angitt, null feltverdier vises som tomme strenger ("").

trans-unit.source: When a record is being updated or inserted in a data-bound control, if the user enters the value specified by this property (other than an empty string) for a field in a data-bound control, that value is automatically converted to null in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Når en post angis blir oppdatert eller er satt inn i en databundet kontroll hvis brukeren angir verdien av denne egenskapen (bortsett fra en tom streng) for et felt i en databundet kontroll at verdien automatisk konverteres til null i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To convert an empty string field value to a null value, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For å konvertere en verdi for feltet for tom streng til en null-verdi, kan du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A>

trans-unit.source: The caption displayed for a field when the field's value is null.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som vises for et felt når feltverdien er null.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Binds the value of a field to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Binding verdien for et felt i <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField.OnDataBindField%2A> method is a helper method used to bind the value of a field in the data source to a corresponding cell in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField.OnDataBindField%2A>metoden er en helper brukes til å binde verdien av feltet i datakilden til en tilsvarende celle i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField.OnDataBindField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: Kilden for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The control to which the field value is bound is not a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen feltverdien er bundet til er ikke en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the value of the field can be modified in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om verdien i feltet kan endres i redigeringsmodus.

trans-unit.source: Use the ReadOnly property to prevent the values displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object from being modified.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ReadOnly-egenskapen for å hindre verdiene som vises i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>objektet blir endret.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: When a data-bound control is in edit mode, fields that are read-only are displayed as plain text, without any editing controls.
trans-unit.target: Når en databundet kontroll i redigeringsmodus, vises feltene som er skrivebeskyttet som ren tekst, uten noen redigering kontroller.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The ReadOnly property applies only to edit mode.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I ReadOnly-egenskapen gjelder bare for redigeringsmodusen.

trans-unit.source: To prevent fields from showing up in insert mode, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.InsertVisible%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å hindre at vises i insert-modus, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.InsertVisible%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.InsertVisible%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to prevent the value of the field from being modified in edit mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å hindre at verdien i feltet endres i redigeringsmodus; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether HTML encoding is supported by a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om HTML-kode som støttes av en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The SupportsHtmlEncode property is a helper property used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> class and derived classes to determine whether HTML encoding is supported by the class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SupportsHtmlEncode er en helper-egenskap som brukes av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>klassen og avledede klasser å finne ut om HTML-kode som støttes av klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that HTML encoding is supported by a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer alltid <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> til å angi at HTML-kode som støttes av en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Represents the "this" expression.
trans-unit.target: Representerer "this" uttrykket.

trans-unit.source: This field is used to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object should bind against the data source itself, rather than a field of the data source.
trans-unit.target: Dette feltet brukes til å angi at den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>objektet skal bindes mot datakilden seg selv i stedet for et felt for datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the object's `ToString` value will be displayed in the field.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet objektets `ToString` vises verdien i feltet.

trans-unit.source: This field is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Dette feltet brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the control validates client input or not.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som bestemmer om kontrollen validerer klienten inndata eller ikke.

trans-unit.source: A value that determines whether the control validates client input or not.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som bestemmer om kontrollen validerer klienten inndata eller ikke.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Web.UI.ValidateRequestMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Web.UI.ValidateRequestMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the controls contained in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref> object support callbacks.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om kontrollene finnes i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"> </xref> objekt støtte tilbakeringinger.

trans-unit.source: The ValidateSupportsCallback method is a helper method used to determine whether the controls contained in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object support callbacks.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ValidateSupportsCallback er en helper brukes til å bestemme om kontrollene finnes i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>objekt støtte tilbakeringinger.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: This method has been implemented as an empty method (a method that does not contain any code) to indicate that callbacks are supported.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er implementert som en tom metode (en metode som ikke inneholder kode) til å angi at tilbakeringinger støttes.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.
